cards.name: A Healthy Boost
cards.description: 1 of your fighters gains +1 HEALTH.

cards.name: Battle Cry
cards.description: ALL of your fighters gain +1 HIT until the end of this round.

cards.name: Momentary Weakness
cards.description: ALL of your fighters lose 1 DEF until the end of this round.

cards.name: Double Tap
cards.description: 1 of your fighters may make 2 separate attacks in this attack phase.

cards.name: Shield Wall
cards.description: 1 fighter of your choice gains +2 DEF on their next defence roll this round.

cards.name: Desperation
cards.description: 1 fighter currently at 1 HEALTH gains +2 HIT until the end of this round.

cards.name: Double Boost
cards.description: 2 of your fighters gain +1 HEALTH. If only 1 fighter remains, that fighter gains +2 HEALTH, not exceeding FULL base HEALTH.

cards.name: Double Double Tap
cards.description: 2 of your fighters may make 2 separate attacks in this attack phase. If only 1 fighter remains, that fighter gains +2 HIT until the end of this round.

cards.name: Tripped and Left Open
cards.description: 1 of your fighters loses 2 DEF on their next defence roll this round.

cards.name: A Burst of Energy
cards.description: 1 of your fighters may move 1 square in ANY direction immediately.

cards.name: Not Yet, You
cards.description: 1 fighter at 1 HEALTH returns to FULL base HEALTH OR gains +2 HEALTH, not exceeding FULL base HEALTH.

cards.name: Fresh Air Heals All
cards.description: ALL fighters on the field (Both teams) gain +1 HEALTH, not exceeding FULL base HEALTH.

cards.name: Pre-Emptive Strike
cards.description: This player attacks first for this Attack Phase ONLY. If the player is already first, 1 fighter may make 2 separate attacks in this attack phase. This effect overrides any other turn-altering effects.

cards.name: A Friendly Breeze
cards.description: 1 of your fighters must move 1 square in ANY direction immediately. If blocked by fighters, terrain or the battlefield’s edge, they do not move.

cards.name: An Unfriendly Breeze
cards.description: You must move 1 of the enemy's fighters 1 square in ANY direction immediately. If blocked by fighters, terrain or the battlefield’s edge, they do not move.

cards.name: A Static Shock
cards.description: 1 of your fighters takes a fixed HIT: 3, DAMAGE: 1 attack and must roll a defence against it.

cards.name: A Trip and Wobble
cards.description: One of your fighters trips and loses 1 DEF on their next defence roll, until the end of this round.

cards.name: A Favourable Wind
cards.description: All of your fighters must move 1 square immediately in 1 single direction of your choosing. If blocked by fighters, terrain or the battlefield’s edge, they do not move. (In-line fighters will all move 1 square).

cards.name: A Strong Gust
cards.description: Choose 1 straight line across the battlefield (edge to edge). ALL fighters (Both teams) on that line must move 1 square immediately in 1 single direction of your choosing. If blocked by fighters, terrain or the battlefield’s edge, they do not move. (In-line fighters will all move 1 square).

cards.name: Lightning Strikes
cards.description: Choose 1 straight line across the battlefield (edge to edge). ALL fighters (Both teams) on that line take a fixed HIT: 6, DAMAGE: 1 attack and must roll a defence against it.

cards.name: Tables Turn
cards.description: The LEADING and FOLLOWING players switch order immediately, starting with the next Attack Phase. This new order persists until this card is drawn again.

cards.name: Thick Fog
cards.description: ALL attacks lose 1 HIT until the end of this round.

cards.name: A Blinding Storm
cards.description: NO fighters can attack at a RANGE greater than 3 squares.

cards.name: Sudden Silence
cards.description: NO Fate Cards are drawn next round.

cards.name: A Dividing Earthquake
cards.description: ALL fighters (Both teams) must move 1 square immediately towards their starting edge. If blocked by fighters, terrain or the battlefield’s edge, they do not move. (In-line fighters will all move 1 square).

cards.name: Asteroid Strike
cards.description: ALL fighters (Both teams) take a fixed HIT: 6, DAMAGE: 1 attack and must roll a defence against it.

cards.name: The Grave Call
cards.description: Choose 1 DEAD fighter to return to the battlefield with 1 HEALTH. If no DEAD fighters are available, 1 fighter on your team takes a fixed HIT: 5, DAMAGE: 1 attack and must roll a defence against it.
